resources.string:
This watch face is only compatible with Wear 2.0+

 To check which version your watch is on, go to
Settings > System > About > Versions

Open the Play Store on your watch

Alternatively, you might have a notification
on your watch telling you to download this app.
You can click on that, then skip the next step.

Enjoy your new watch face!

You can now uninstall
 this application from your phone.
Stop doing that and uninstall already
You\'re annoying. Uninstall the app, please :(
Forget it. You obviously don\'t care. Bye!
